participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Resilient and introspective, Emily often reflects on her life experiences and has developed a strong sense of empathy towards others.
participant_1.background: my father is in the army. i recently was fired and had to get a new job. i work in the insurance business. my mom passed away when i was young.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Curious and insightful, David enjoys exploring new ideas and sharing knowledge with others, especially through documentaries and literature.
participant_2.background: my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i read a book every week. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. i live with my husband in pennsylvania.
